reviews.review: Its a great game to play. Its story is amazing 10/10

Just incredible. 

GLaDOS' monologues, dark humour and sarcarsm are certainly one of the best things in this game! This sequel sure did add a lot of depth to the character that is GLaDOS, [spoiler] with that whole thing with Cave Johnson and Caroline, which GLaDOS discovers that caroline lives within her "brain"[/spoiler].

They also added a really nice feature. The "Co-op Mode", which is really fun and intuitive and it happens in a setting that's somewhat different than the "Singleplayer Mode" (aka. the original story) one, so that it won't be boring and bland.
it is only one dollar and it is really fun you can portal anywhere you want as long as its a portal surface

This game is great. There's a deep, rich backstory, plenty of twists and turns, and it has excellent replay value. A testament to the genius at Valve. Highly recommended.

Basically a spatial puzzle game in a sci-fi post-apocalyptic world with an engaging story and clever, flavorful characters. I find the difficulty level very satisfying, not to easy or too hard (I consider myself decent to good at spatial puzzles). The UI is adapted from an FPS, but very few points in the game require quick reflexes and the only time you encounter guns is when you're on the receiving end. Learn why the cake is a lie in this resilient classic.

This game is a true 10/10. Great story and characters, clever level design, and innovative, fun mechanics. On top of that, there is a ton of content for the asking price. During sales, this game even drops down to only $0.99. It's a must-buy and a must-play.
The game is perfect, perfect storyline, perfect set-ups, and completely new concepts that make sense! I reccomend that everyone plays this game. It WILL blow your mind
